title: The Creation
description:
Description :
        Johann, who had been tormented by loan sharks, was lynched by them and lost consciousness. When he opened his eyes, the world was frozen in stillness, and a gigantic moon rose between the buildings. As Johann looked around, a mysterious man dressed in white approached him.

"Do you know what my name is?"

Johann, not even remembering his own name, began to walk through this tranquil world with the enigmatic man…
